text: (to unaka kya kahana tha) khairaat to bas khaas phakeeron ka haq hai aur mohataajon ka aur us (zakaat vagairah) ke kaarindon ka aur jinakee taaleef qalab kee gaee hai (unaka) aur (jin kee) gardanon mein (gulaamee ka phanda pada hai unaka) aur gaddaaron ka (jo khuda se ada nahin kar sakate) aur khuda kee raah (jihaad) mein aur paradesiyon kee kifaalat mein kharch karana chaahie ye hukooq khuda kee taraph se muqarrar kie hue hain aur khuda bada vaaqiph kaar hikamat vaala hai
